price: Quien anhele la recompensa de esta vida mundanal, sepa que Dios dispone de la recompensa de esta vida y de la otra. Dios todo lo oye, todo lo ve.
arabic: مَّن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu thawāba al-dun'yā faʿinda al-lahi thawābu al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wakāna al-lahu samīʿan baṣīran
